game.name: Saints Row: The Third - FUNTIME! Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Go super ballistic with the FUNTIME! Pack which gives you a new weapon, vehicle, and outfit. Terrorize your enemies by sucking them up and shooting them out with the Genki Man-A-Pult! Pull the trigger on the Mollusk Launcher and unleash the power of an exploding, mind-controlling octopus!
